short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A launcher to test yellow.ai web widgets on any website

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will help users of yellow.ai to test their chatbot and web widgets on their website. The widget inserted will be for their browser only. This way, they will be able to try out the widgets before deploying changes to their website.
